timeline.bodyText: Pls remove this checking since it is already verified by org.prebid.server.validation.RequestValidator so no need to do it in each bidder.

timeline.bodyText:
Seems we need to rename method name to impExtToImps(..).
We don't need to pass whole BidRequest object as method argument here since we use only request.getImp().
